func.name: exportOrders
func.des: 导出订单记录并自动发送邮箱
func.job: select orders.id,orders.name,orders.tel,orders.detail, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(goods.name,IF(ISNULL(shopping.attach),'',CONCAT('(',shopping.attach,')')),' X',shopping.count) SEPARATOR ';') goods, orders.orderno from orders,shopping,goods where orders.state = 2 and orders.id = shopping.orderid and shopping.goodid = goods.id group by orders.id order by orders.id
